title: How to Make an Eggless Date Cake

steps.headline: Warm the milk slightly and soak the dates in it for about 2-3 hours.
Next, drain the milk.
steps.description: De-seed and grind the soaked dates with sugar and the drained milk to a smooth paste.

steps.headline: Add oil to the paste and mix well.
Mix the flour and the baking soda and sieve together.
Add the mixture of flour and baking soda to the smooth paste 1 tbsp at a time while mixing.
Add the yogurt as well as the chopped nuts and mix well.
Bake the batter in a greased dish for 35-40 minutes.

text: Warm the milk slightly and soak the dates in it for about 2-3 hours.  Next, drain the milk. De-seed and grind the soaked dates with sugar and the drained milk to a smooth paste. Add oil to the paste and mix well.  Mix the flour and the baking soda and sieve together.  Add the mixture of flour and baking soda to the smooth paste 1 tbsp at a time while mixing.  Add the yogurt as well as the chopped nuts and mix well.  Preheat the oven to about  350 °F (177 °C).  Bake the batter in a greased dish for 35-40 minutes. Enjoy! Finished.
